content:
There are plenty of pet-friendly restaurants in New York City where you can dine with your furry friend. Here are a few recommendations:

1. The Barking Dog: This restaurant offers an extensive menu for both humans and dogs. You and your pet can dine together on the outdoor patio. 2. Shake Shack: This popular fast-food chain allows dogs in their outdoor seating area. They even have a special menu for dogs. 3. Little Italy Pizza: This casual pizza joint in Greenwich Village allows dogs on their outdoor seating area. 4. The Dog House: This hot dog stand in the West Village allows dogs in their outdoor seating area. They also offer dog-friendly meals. 5. Sweetgreen: This healthy salad chain allows dogs on their outdoor patio. Make sure to call ahead and confirm that these restaurants still allow dogs, as restaurant policies can change over time. It's also a good idea to bring a water bowl for your furry friend to stay hydrated while dining out.
